MerkleClaim.claimTokens() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c132c7b178fba4861133d552483c7950830cb134_MerkleClaim.sol#261-277) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(total_lock_amount[msg.sender].sub(user_released[msg.sender]) > 0,all token has been claimed) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c132c7b178fba4861133d552483c7950830cb134_MerkleClaim.sol#263)
	- total_release_amount >= total_lock_amount[msg.sender] (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c132c7b178fba4861133d552483c7950830cb134_MerkleClaim.sol#267)
	- require(bool,string)(dpr.balanceOf(address(this)) >= release_amount,MerkleClaim: Balance not enough) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c132c7b178fba4861133d552483c7950830cb134_MerkleClaim.sol#274)
	- require(bool,string)(dpr.transfer(msg.sender,release_amount),MerkleClaim: Transfer Failed) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c1/c132c7b178fba4861133d552483c7950830cb134_MerkleClaim.sol#275)
